name: Path tracing
description: Demonstration of tracing paths between nodes
discussion: This is a demonstration of the path tracing functionality
Nodes here are positioned using a ForceDirected layout.
Edges are directed in this demonstration - the arrow shows the direction.
Edges cannot be traversed in the opposite direction to the way the arrow points
Click a node to select it. Then click another node. The shortest path between the two nodes will be traversed with an overlay. If no path exists, an alert will show.
Use the pause/play/cancel buttons to change the state of the path trace animation.
